  4. ###############################################################################

  6. all test check sample clean install uninstall: platform-deps
  7.         cd src && $(MAKE) $@

  9. platform-deps:
  10.         sh ./tools/configure.sh build_config.mk .

  12. distclean:
  13.         rm -f src/*.o src/*.a src/*.so src/*.sl src/*.a_* src/*.so_* src/*.sl_*
  14.         rm -f samples/*.o samples/*_sample samples/*_sample_*
  15.         rm -f tests/*.o tests/*_test tests/*_test_*
  16.         find . -name \*.o -type f |xargs rm -f
  17.         find . -name \*~ -type f |xargs rm -f
  18.         find . -name \*.bak -type f |xargs rm -f
  19.         find . -name .prog*_config* -type f |xargs rm -f
